name: MarcusGrimm-OnMarketing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

des: The best of today's marketing news, strategies, tactics and insights. We scour more than a hundred of the top marketing sites daily, so you don't have to.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
